title: Introduction to Programming in Python
description: Learn Python programming from scratch using MIT's open courseware materials. Master fundamental programming concepts, data structures, and algorithms using Python. Build real-world applications and prepare for a career in software development.
outcomes: Master Python syntax and data structures

modules.title: Introduction to Python
modules.content: Based on MIT's Introduction to Computer Science and Programming in Python

modules.title: Data Structures
modules.content: Based on MIT's Data Structures and Algorithms

modules.title: Object-Oriented Programming
modules.content: Based on MIT's Object-Oriented Programming Concepts

modules.title: Final Project
modules.content: Capstone project combining all learned concepts

certificates.name: MIT OpenCourseWare Certificate
